column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This was one of my few touristy spots the last time I was in Chicago.  We went on Thursday
column2: when Illinois residents got in for free from 5-.  I bought my full price ticket
column5: while my boyfriend waited in line.   He told me I could of probably snagged a free ticket since all they did was ask for a zip code.  Oh well
column6: my money when to a great institute.
